body.p: Clicking the symbol adds an ellipse shape.

The general principle is the same as for the circle shape. In addition you get four nodes on the ellipse line. Clickon the nodes to adjust the ellipse's eccentricity. Ctrl+clickon them to rotate the ellipse or, alternatively, use Shift+Ctrl+scroll. Shift+clickin the shape to toggle the gradual decay between equidistant and proportional mode.
